properties.description: Quick access to the panel structure nodes references
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Indicates the eon-scroll whether it needs arrow scrolls or not           Values true, false           Default: false
properties.name: arrowScrolls

properties.description: Wether or not the default style should be applied           Values: true, false           Default: true
properties.name: defaultStyle

properties.description: Indicates whether the eon-scroll will auto-fill its container or grow according to its content until it fills its container           Values true, false           Default: true
properties.name: fill

properties.description: Import href content on demand           Values true, false           Default: false
properties.name: lazyLoad

properties.description: In case of being used in eon-tabs it will be used internally to link a tab to its panel
properties.name: name

properties.description: Sets the type of the scroll
properties.name: scrollType

properties.description: In case of being used in eon-tabs , it will be used as a visual text for the tab
properties.name: tabTitle

properties.description: Indicates the thickness for the eon-scroll rails           Default: 15
properties.name: thickness

methods.description: Store scripts to be executed later
methods.name: _deferScripts

methods.description: Extract content and remove the template node
methods.name: _removeTemplate

params.description: Node element containing the panel content
params.name: tmp

methods.description: Remove event callbacks and reset its state
methods.name: _resetCallback

methods.description: Check if the default element style should be applied
methods.name: _setDefaultStyle

methods.description: Append content to the panel or the scroll container if exists
methods.name: appendContent

params.description: Node element containing the panel content
params.name: nodes

methods.description: Set panel content local or from remote html
methods.name: importContent

params.description: Document fragment used to append imported content into
params.name: fragment

methods.description: Remove current content and re-import content
methods.name: refresh

methods.description: Extract content from template and remove it from DOM
methods.name: render
